target_text.name: target_text
target_text.description: Target text of the activity, which is actually the translation of the source text.

translator.name: translator
translator.description: Unique identifier of the translator/proofreader of this activity.

type.name: type
type.description: Currently there are two available activity types; 'translated', 'proofread'.

key.name: key
key.description: This is the unique package tracking key. You can use this key to track the current progress of the translation packaging with /package/check call.

status.name: status
status.description: The status of translation packaging. Possible values are 'started', 'packaging', 'completed'. When completed, you can make a /download call to download the last translation package.

status.name: status
status.description: The status of translation packaging. Possible values are 'started', 'packaging', 'completed'. When completed, you can make a /download call to download the last translation package.

callback_url.name: callback_url
callback_url.description: Callback URL to notify when project status changed.

custom.name: custom
custom.description: Custom data provided while creating a new project.

errors.name: errors
errors.description: A list of errors. Visible when creating a project and uploading your documents at the same time, in case of multiple errors.

title: MotaWord
description: Use MotaWord API to post and track your translation projects.

200.description: JSON representation of our Swagger API definition.

methods.description: The root endpoint will provide you a JSON Swagger definition.
Get a list of supported formats for documents, style guides and extensions.
methods.displayName: Get a list of supported formats

methods.description: Download your corporate account's global glossary. This endpoint is available only for corporate account customers.
Update your corporate account's global glossary. This endpoint is available only for corporate account customers.
methods.displayName: Create or update the global glossary.

methods.description: Get a list of supported languages
methods.displayName: Get a list of supported languages
Get your account information and summary.

methods.description: Get a list of your projects
methods.displayName: Get a list of your projects

methods.description: Create a new project
Get single project
Update project language pairs

200.description: Translation package streamed. The streamed file is always a ZIP file, except when the API client is configured for Drupal and Wordpress.

methods.description: Download the latest translation package. You must have given a /package call beforehand and wait until the packaging status is 'completed'.

200.description: Translation package streamed. The streamed file is always a ZIP file, except when the API client is configured for Drupal and Wordpress.

methods.description: Download only the translation package of this language. You must have given a /package call beforehand and wait until the packaging status is 'completed'.

language.name: language
language.description: Language code. You can download the translation of only a specific language.

async.name: async
async.description: If you want to package and download the translation synchronously, mark this parameter as '0'. It will package the translation and then return the packaged file in the response, identical to /download call after an asynchronous /package call.

methods.description: Package the translation project, make it ready to be downloaded.
methods.displayName: Package the translation of all languages to be downloaded.

key.name: key
key.description: This is the package tracking key provided in the response of a /package call.

methods.description: This request will tell you the current progress of the translation packaging. You will use the 'key' provided by the /package call.
methods.displayName: Track the status of translation packaging.

async.name: async
async.description: If you want to package and download the translation synchronously, mark this parameter as '0'. It will package the translation and then return the packaged file in the response, identical to /download call after an asynchronous /package call.

200.description: Packaging status and tracking code. With the package key, you can track the progress of translation packaging.

201.description: Packaged translation streamed. Status code is actually 200, not 201.

methods.description: Package the translation project, make it ready to be downloaded.
methods.displayName: Package the translation of a specific target language to be downloaded.

language.name: language
language.description: Language code. You can package the translation of only a specific language.

methods.description: Get the progress of an already launched project.

Submit a comment to an activity.

methods.description: Get a list of comments belonging to this activity.

methods.description: Get a list of activity comments throughout the whole project.
methods.displayName: Get a list of activity comments throughout the whole project.
